page.title: 02Education
page.content: At Primary level, Local Authority education is provided for the area at Mattocks School, Wellbank, and at Murroes School, Duntrune. Normally pupils proceed for Secondary Education to Monifieth High School, which is a six year comprehensive school. There is also provision for pre-school education in a Nursery Class at Murroes Primary School, which has ten places for four-year-old children, most of whom come from the Murroes, Wellbank and Tealing areas. The needs of students who wish to proceed to Tertiary Education locally are catered for in Dundee at the University, College of Commerce, Kingsway Technical College, and the College of Education.
